title: Record Audio
description: Ability to record audio while inside a practice session

title: Practice History
description: Access to your entire practice history. Grouped by day with the ability to filter by practice label

title: Trends
description: Recived more feedback on your current practice trends compared week to week, or to your average.

title: Sharing a Session/Streak/Daily Progress
description: Ability to send practice sessions, current streak, or daily reports to a friend. Simliar to sharing your Apple Workout activity.

title: iPad App
description: A native iPad app with shared data between iPhone and iPad versions.
